r.s: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.d: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.n: * Removed $key and $format from render() parameters * Changed method name from render() to render_xhtml() (this will allow easier extension) * Changed "tighten" rule behavior (now removes all newlines, this speeds up parsing by 30%) * Changed docs/TokenRuleKeys (removed "tighten") * Changed docs/HomePage (added info on Text_Wiki() $options param)
